attributes.action: Ban smoking while at the wheel of an automobile (Van, Car, Lorry, Etc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make it a crime to smoke (hold a tobacco product) while at the wheel of a car, van or lorry etc.  This is just as bad as watching someone use a mobile phone oe eating at the wheel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
